src:
Kolumna Miše Terček: Med dvema praprotnicama
Zaradi vse večje priljubljenosti oddaje je bilo zato le še vprašanje časa, kdaj jo bodo pograbili veliki televizijski koncerni.
01 Nov 2019, 14:58 by Miša Terček



Between Two Ferns: Igralec Matthew McConaughey in TV-voditelj Zach Galifianakis FOTOGRAFIJI: NETFLIX



Merjenje obveznih praprotnic


Satirična TV-oddaja Between Two Ferns (Med dvema praprotnicama) je zagotovo ena od najbolj izvirnih in duhovitih stvaritev, ki je našla pot do milijonov gledalcev brez pomoči večje televizijske mreže. Njen gostitelj Zach Galifianakis, komedijant in igralec, ki ga najbrž poznate iz trilogije filmov Prekrokana noč (The Hangover), je serijo nizkoproračunskih intervjujev najprej objavljal na spletni strani Funny or Die.Zaradi vse večje priljubljenosti oddaje je bilo zato le še vprašanje časa, kdaj jo bodo pograbili veliki televizijski koncerni.Potegavščina, v kateri morda povsem naključni igralci mislijo, da gre za dejanski intervju z znanimi osebnostmi (v resnici gre za skrbno načrtovan scenarij, v katerem sodelujeta oba, tako gostitelj kot tudi gost), je kaj hitro pritegnila pozornost spletnega občinstva in tako rekoč čez noč postala kultna. Samo na youtubu imajo posamezne epizode Between Two Ferns na desetine milijonov ogledov. Kaj takšnega seveda ne bi bilo mogoče, če ne bi Galifianakis gostil imen svetovne slave, kot so Ben Stiller, Bruce Willis, Jerry Seinfeld in Hillary Clinton, v goste je med predsedovanjem ZDA prišel celo takratni ameriški predsednik Barack Obama, kar je bila spretna propagandna poteza, za oddajo pa le še ena potrditev, kakšen doseg in vpliv ima.Posneli so že 21 epizod, v katerih voditelj gostom zastavlja neprijetna in nenavadna vprašanja, pri številnih bi lahko rekli, da gre čez mejo, kar bi bilo lahko usodno, če gostje ne bi bili del scenarija. A čeprav se gledalci tega zavedamo, so neprijetne situacije izpeljane na tako prepričljiv način, da to v sekundi, ko Galifianakis spregovori, enostavno pozabimo. Ja, tako dober je v ustvarjanju lažne resničnosti. Kot je The Daily Show, sicer parodična novičarska oddaja, postal verodostojnejši vir informacij kot resna TV-poročila, tako je postala oddaja Between Two Ferns, v kateri nastopajoča obvezno sedita med dvema lončnicama praprotnic, boljša od marsikatere pogovorne oddaje. Ker sebe in svojih gostov enostavno ne jemlje pretirano resno oziroma jih obravnava z ravno prav sarkazma in cinizma.


Between Two Ferns: Igralec Matthew McConaughey in TV-voditelj Zach Galifianakis FOTOGRAFIJI: NETFLIX

Zaradi vse večje priljubljenosti oddaje je bilo le še vprašanje časa, kdaj jo bodo pograbili veliki televizijski koncerni. A Galifianakis se predobro zaveda, da bi oddaja s tem izgubila svoj čar, on pa bi izgubil ustvarjalni nadzor ter morda celo inspiracijo. Zato je vse megalomanske ponudbe vztrajno zavračal, dokler ni prišla tista prava, pri kateri bi imel kolikor toliko proste roke. Tako drzne ponudbe pa je seveda sposoben zgolj Netflix. A tako nismo dobili le serije novih TV-oddaj, temveč kar celovečerni film, torej niz vsega, oddaj in zakulisja, združen v konkreten paket maratonskega performansa.TV-film so v javnost lansirali prejšnji teden, radovedni gledalci pa že pridno nizajo oglede. Zgodba je preprosta in prepričljiva. Zach ima TV-oddajo Between Two Ferns na manjši lokalni televiziji in sanja o tem, da bi nekoč postal pravi zvezdnik ter vodil večerno pogovorno oddajo na veliki televizijski mreži v slogu The Tonight Show. Njegov studio med intervjujem z igralcem Matthewom McConaugheyjem poplavi in je prisiljen obrniti nov list, zato se z ekipo najožjih sodelavcev odpravi na misijo (tako rekoč na road trip, zaradi česar film postane nekakšen road movie) do Hollywooda, kjer naj bi ga čakalo mesto voditelja nove večerne pogovorne oddaje. Za vsem tem stoji igralec Will Ferrell, ki mu obljublja pot do zvezd.V filmu Between Two Ferns: The Movie piskrček pristavijo številni zvezdniki in mu s kratkimi obiski (t. i. cameo) okrepijo zvezdniški status. Seznam je (za manj kot uro in pol dolg izdelek) neverjeten, saj Zacha med drugimi obiščejo tudi (da ne bomo naštevali prav vseh) Benedict Cumberbatch, Peter Dinklage, Gal Gadot, John Legend, David Letterman, Keanu Reeves in Matt Berninger.Film bi sicer zaradi resničnostne note lahko označili za mockumentarec (parodični dokumentarec), kritiki pa so ga sprejeli z odprtimi rokami ter celo omenili, da je Zach s tem ustvaril nekaj, na kar bi bili lahko ponosni celo ustvarjalci kultne in nedotakljive oddaje Saturday Night Live (SNL). To pa je že resna in predvsem redka pohvala.


Merjenje obveznih praprotnic

Vsekakor je Galifianakisu uspelo obdržati ključni moment spletnih TV-intervjujev, katerih čar je bil prav v tem, da so delovali poceni in drugačni. Če odmislimo visokokakovostno produkcijo filma (zadeve razumljivo niso mogli posneti s spletnimi kamerami, Netflix ima kakopak standarde), je scenarij v slogu prvotnega drznega koncepta in ni odjadral predaleč stran v hollywoodske vode, ki po navadi iščejo širše občinstvo, s čimer marsikatero prehudo šalo ali situacijo zato raje cenzurirajo.Zach Galifianakis je nedvomno komedijant internetne dobe, ki dobro razume sodobni humor in mlado generacijo, predvsem pa obvlada brisanje mej med zrežiranim in resničnim. Zato je tudi oddaja Between Two Ferns najbrž eden najboljših humorističnih izdelkov 21. stoletja – in kot kaže, bo tudi ta film prestal preizkus časa. Obvezen ogled.
text:
Misa Tercek's column: Between two flipsides
Due to the growing popularity of the show, it was only a matter of time before the big television gigs would grab it.
01 Nov 2019, 13:58 by Miša Terček



Between Two Ferns: Actor Matthew McConaughey and TV presenter Zach Galifianakis PHOTOS: NETFLIX



Measurement of mandatory flips


The satirical TV show Between Two Ferns is certainly one of the most original and witty creations to find its way to millions of viewers without the help of a major television network. Its host Zach Galifianakis, a comedian and actor you probably know from The Hangover movie trilogy, first published a series of low-budget interviews on Funny or Die. she'll be grabbed by big television gigs.A prank in which possibly random players think it's an actual interview with celebrities (it's really a carefully planned scenario involving both host and guest) has quickly attracted attention the attention of the online audience, and so to speak, became cult overnight. On YouTube alone, individual episodes of Between Two Ferns have tens of millions of views. Of course, this would not have been possible without Galifianakis hosting world-renowned names such as Ben Stiller, Bruce Willis, Jerry Seinfeld and Hillary Clinton, even then-President Barack Obama came to visit during the US Presidency. the show is just another confirmation of the reach and impact it has had. They have already recorded 21 episodes in which the host asks guests uncomfortable and unusual questions, many of which could be said to cross the border, which could be fatal if guests would not be part of the script. But even though viewers are aware of this, the unpleasant situations are executed in such a convincing way that we simply forget about it in the second when Galifianakis speaks. Yes, he is so good at creating false reality. As The Daily Show, otherwise a parody news show, has become a more credible source of information than serious TV reports, so has the Between Two Ferns show, in which the performer is bound to sit between two potted ferns, better than many talk shows. Because he simply does not take himself and his guests too seriously or treats them with just the right sarcasm and cynicism.


Between Two Ferns: Actor Matthew McConaughey and TV presenter Zach Galifianakis PHOTOS: NETFLIX

Due to the growing popularity of the show, it was only a matter of time before the big television gigs would grab it. But Galifianakis is well aware that the show would lose its charm, and he would lose creative control and perhaps even inspiration. That is why he persistently refused all the megalomaniacal offers until the right one came into his hands. Of course, only Netflix is capable of such bold offers. But not only did we get a series of new TV shows, but a feature film, a series of everything, shows and behind the scenes, combined into a concrete package of marathon performance. The TV movie was launched last week, and curious viewers are already watching. The story is simple and compelling. Zach has a TV show Between Two Ferns on smaller local television and dreams of becoming a star once and running an evening talk show on The Tonight Show's big television network. In an interview with actor Matthew McConaughey, his studio floods and is forced to turn over a new sheet, so he goes on a mission with his team of close associates (so to speak, on a road trip, making the movie a kind of road movie) to Hollywood, where he is expected to be a leader new evening talk shows. Behind all of this is actor Will Ferrell, who promises him a path to stars. In Between Two Ferns: The Movie, the beast is landed by many celebrities and reinforces his star status with brief visits (aka cameo). The list is (for less than an hour and a half long product) amazing, as Zacha is visited, among others (not to mention all) by Benedict Cumberbatch, Peter Dinklage, Gal Gadot, John Legend, David Letterman, Keanu Reeves and Matt Berninger.Film The reality note could be called a mockumentary (parody documentary), but critics have embraced it with open arms and even mentioned that Zach created something that even the makers of the cult and untouchable Saturday Night Live show ( SNL). This, however, is already a serious and especially rare praise.


Measurement of mandatory flips

In any case, Galifianakis managed to retain the crucial moment of online TV interviews, the charm of which was that they seemed cheap and different. Thinking of high-quality movie production (things couldn't be captured by webcams, Netflix has standards by all means), the script is in the style of the original bold concept and didn't go too far into the Hollywood waters, usually seeking a wider audience, making many jokes or Therefore, they prefer to censor the situation.Zach Galifianakis is undoubtedly an Internet age comedian who has a good understanding of modern humor and the young generation, but most of all manages to erase the boundaries between the real and the real. That's why the Between Two Ferns show is probably one of the best humorous products of the 21st century - and it looks like this movie will stand the test of time. Required viewing.
